riddles.title: Weekly Riddle
riddles.subtitle: Riddles you need to solve weekly
riddles.description: I can add to several hundred. But can’t subtract multiply or divide. Whatever I add to, it’s always in front of you but never behind. And the number I add to You can’t really hide!

riddles.title: 1 Day Exp. Riddles
riddles.subtitle: 1 day for solving
riddles.description: I'm a puzzling enigma that beckons for a solution within a day's span. While I can accumulate into the hundreds, I'm immune to subtraction, multiplication, or division. I'm always present, never trailing behind, and the figure I increase can't be concealed. Who am I?

riddles.title: 3 Days Exp. Riddles
riddles.subtitle: 3 days for solving
riddles.description: Embark on a three-day journey to unravel my enigma. I possess the ability to grow into substantial sums, yet remain impervious to mathematical operations such as subtraction, multiplication, or division. I'm forever present, leading the way, and my augmented value is impossible to mask. Who might I be?
riddles.riddle: Who lurks behind this veil of mystery?

riddles.title: Special Brand Riddles
riddles.subtitle: Riddles related with popular brands such as
riddles.description: Dive into the realm of branded puzzles, where I await your deciphering. Capable of augmentation into significant quantities, I'm immune to the arithmetic trio of subtraction, multiplication, and division. Ever-present and upfront, my additional value refuses to be concealed. Can you discern my identity?

hints.title: To solve some riddle, please choose the one you like
